name: 陳志恆
objective:
探討物質表面之化學結構及性質，相關的理論基礎及技術。
Goal of course：
Surface chemistry is a since of wide applications, involving chemical, material, high-tech electronic process, biotechnology and environmental engineering. This course will introduce the basic concepts of surface chemistry and the applications in various modern technologies.
